          <title>
            <string language="en">Interference fringes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Störung Fransen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Franges d'interférence</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Franjas da interferência</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Frange di interferenza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιθώρια παρέμβασης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Franjas de interferencia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how two interfering light beams from two slits produce interference patterns.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">interference patterns</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light beams</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light fringes</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie zwei behinderende 
Lichtstrahlen von zwei Schlitzen Interferenzmuster produzieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment deux faisceaux 
lumineux d'intervention de deux fentes produisent des configurations 
d'interférence.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como dois feixes 
luminosos interferindo de duas réguas produzem testes padrões de 
interferência.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come due raggi di 
luce interferenti da due fessure producono i modelli di interferenza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς δύο παρεμβαίνοντας
ελαφριές ακτίνες από δύο σχισμές παράγουν τα πρότυπα 
παρέμβασης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo dos rayos de luz 
que interfieren a partir de dos rajas producen modelos de 
interferencia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interferenzmuster</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lichtstrahlen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">helle Fransen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">configurations d'interférence</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
